actions.text: Ordered to be Reported Adversely by Voice Vote.
Reported adversely by the Committee on Ways and Means. H. Rept. 106-794.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 460.
Consideration initiated by previous order of the House.
Considered by previous order of the House.
DEBATE - Pursuant to a previous order, the House proceeded with one hour of debate on H.J. Res. 99.
The previous question was ordered pursuant to a previous  order of the House.
On passage Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 91 - 332 (Roll no. 441).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Disapproving the extension of the waiver authority contained in section 402(c) of the Trade Act of 1974 with respect to Vietnam.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Disapproves the extension with respect to Vietnam (as recommended by the President to Congress on June 2, 2000) of the President's authority under the Trade Act of 1974 to waive a nonmarket economy country's ineligibility to receive nondiscriminatory treatment (normal trade relations) and credit extensions because of restrictions on freedom to emigrate.

titles.title: Disapproving the extension of the waiver authority contained in section 402(c) of the Trade Act of 1974 with respect to Vietnam.
